mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of the city of Richmond, Va: a souvenir of the Yorktown Centennial, October 18th, 1881
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: McGehee Miniature Book Collection (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 24 x 37 cm. folded in cover 8 x 5 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Key to buildings printed in upper right corner.
"Presented with the compliments of Stephen Hunter, proprietor of St. Claire Hotel, 9th and Grace Streets, Richmond, Va." -- p. [4] of cover.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: G3884 .R5 1881 .M35: Original printed yellow wrappers; map is detached from the front wrapper, with a small section adhering to the wrapper. Cocke Fund, 2001/2002.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Lindemann 06517: Original printed paper covers. The McGehee Miniature Book Collection. Given by Caroline Yarnall McGehee Lindemann in memory of her husband, Carden Coleman McGehee, UVA 1947
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: St. Claire Hotel (Richmond, Va.)
Miniature books--Specimens.
Richmond (Va.)--Maps.
Yorktown (Va.)--History--Siege, 1781--Centennial celebrations, etc.
